projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern portfolio website built with Vue 3, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features a clean design, dark mode support, and dynamic content loading.

features.name: Dynamic Content Loading
features.description: Load content dynamically from markdown files in separate repositories

features.name: Dark Mode Support
features.description: Automatic and manual dark mode switching with system preference detection

features.name: Project Showcase
features.description: Interactive project gallery with detailed case studies
